dcterms:description: A multi-spectral dataset designed for autonomous and assisted driving, capturing data under various lighting conditions including day and night.

dcterms:description: A dataset that utilizes aerial thermography for modeling the energy dynamics of urban environments.
dcterms:title: Aerial thermography for energetic modelling of cities

dcterms:creator: E. Mandanici
P. Conte
V. A. Girelli
dcterms:description: A dataset that integrates aerial thermal imagery, LiDAR data, and ground surveys for mapping surface temperatures in urban areas.
dcterms:title: Integration of aerial thermal imagery, LiDAR data and ground surveys for surface temperature mapping in urban environments

dcterms:creator: S. Vidas
P. Moghadam
M. Bosse
dcterms:description: A dataset focused on 3D thermal mapping of building interiors using a combination of RGB-D and thermal cameras.
dcterms:title: 3D thermal mapping of building interiors using an RGB-D and thermal camera

dcterms:creator: S. Vidas
P. Moghadam
dcterms:description: A dataset for a handheld 3D thermography system designed for energy auditing.
dcterms:title: HeatWave: A handheld 3D thermography system for energy auditing
